text: ("Closer" by The Chainsmokers ft. Halsey)

♪ Hey I was doing just
fine before I met you ♪
♪ I drink too much and that's an issue ♪
♪ But I'm okay ♪

♪ Hey you tell your friends
it was nice to meet them ♪

pretty in a hotel bar ♪
